Multi-Channel Marketing & Operations Officer , Growth Accelerator
ApexOutcomes-Public Speaker, Growth Strategies & Workshop Expert
Scottsdale, AZ - National and Global In Scope

21st CENTURY GROWTH STRATEGY, RESULTS GUIDANCE, WORKSHOPS & PUBLIC SPEAKING.  WORKFORCE DEVELOPMENT, INSPIRATION, GROWTH PROGRAMS CREATION:We work together with you and your team to actively engage in the best planning, decisions, and the execution of both I.T. infrastructure as well as profitable, multi-channel growth opportunities; through all channels. (Retail and Print are not dead!  They just need to be crafted, communicated, and delivered beautifully.)  Our goal is to always invigorate your next stage of growth, and streamline your operations and resources to optimize cash flow.+We craft and perform workshops and public speaking engagements that help you pinpoint your   target audience and communicate with your business goals in mind.+We assess your workflow and help you make the best I.T. automation decisions. +We help you improve upon communication techniques and strategies that improve happiness    levels and profits.+We get to know your team and make operational and talent engagement recommendations.+We engage with, re-invigorate and motivate you and your team.+We actively participate in negotiating and everything that can improve your profits.+We identify new and bigger revenue generating opportunities.+We help with your launch planning or re-invigoration planning.*You leverage our ability to generate hundreds of millions in revenue, manage successful strategic   growth relationships, build out high-engagement web presence as well as eCommerce results, logistics/workflow solutions, as well as high-impact articulations for every channel! Your streamlined success, health and happiness is our goal.www.ApexOutcomes.com

Rising Tycoons offers Entrepreneurship and Leadership education programs for youth ranging in age from 14-21. The programs run in private schools, charter schools, youth clubs, sports clubs, public schools, in public libraries, community colleges, and even inside private and public corporate offices.  Bottom line is, the programs connect the teens with their purpose and ignite real-life skills. Plus, parents see what their teens can accomplish all on their own, when given the chance.The programs involve community leaders, school administrators, highly motivated teens, lost teens, and their relevant family and influentials ('the village')I'm a huge advocate of real-life-based education, entrepreneurial-inspired workforce development, purpose-based learning methods, ISD and niche skills development.  Rising Tycoons does this for youth, and sparks our youth onto paths that make them recognize their talents, passions and ability to drive results independently, and collaboratively with their peers and community.  An amazing woman named Olenka Cullinan has proven her keen ability to inspire youth for many years, ALL OVER THE WORLD!  My son went through one of her summer workshops and experienced a notable growth process that solidified his professional interests, and drove his confidence to even higher levels.It's absolutely amazing and fulfilling to experience as an adult, an extraordinary effort to support as a business leader, and the results are tangible. Olenka's students who participate in the Rising Tycoons Academies' after school programs even end up launching real businesses by the end of the school year.  The businesses generate revenue, and one student even got funded on Shark Tank!  Thankfully, Olenka has the extreme levels of energy and ability to connect and inspire teens (and tweens), and parents, and school administrators, and community business leaders...everyone involved. I'm honored and excited to be an adviser and occasional instructor.
Founding Partner, Growth Strategist, Partnerships & Programs Specialist

Social Venture Partners is a hybrid venture capital organization and philanthropic organization.  It's a venture philanthropy group that educates individuals how to practice philanthropy.  The organization also donates cash and operational, sales and other expertise to qualifying non-profits.Last I looked, there were 36 Social Venture Partner organizations running strong nationally, and four Social Venture Partner organizations operating quite successfully outside of the United States. (Forgive me, Linked In forced me to choose dates)
Entrepreneur in Residence for Arizona State University (ASU) Campus-Wide

Mentor, Entrepreneurship Workshop Curriculum Development & Instructor; helping gifted and highly motivated students, across all disciplines and grade levels, invent, think and solve issues effectively and streamline business plans for optimum success; developing skills that make them better students, leaders, critical thinkers, and better in life. Also, to connect the students to who and what they need for venture success.Also connecting experienced and successful business leaders with my top choices of ventures.I continue to work with select student ventures on advisory boards, with financial modeling, budgeting, growth strategies, custom programming/offshore development, and everything I can to help successful market launches and revenue growth, whenever I can.ASU was ranked the #1 university in America in Innovation by US News and World Report, and this is just the beginning!  My hubby and I have 2 spectacular children attending ASU, Barrett, the Honors College; our son is a Finance Major with WP Carey Business School (and Alpha Kappa Psi), and our daughter is a Herberger Visual Communication Design major, (freaky amazing freehand artist, technologist, and spirited coder, animator, designer).  Barrett and ASU is an ideal combination for exceptionally motivated and talented students. They are both loving their college experiences.
ActiveForever.com Safety, Health & Medical Equipment Innovations

The company was successfully sold (100% Stock Sale), July 2014, and has changed a lot since.Feinberg ran the business as CEO for 12 years; growing it at a rate exceeding 200,000%, and generating over $90 million in revenues, and from a mom & pop, into a loved market leader.A NEW MODEL OF DIGITAL SALES AGENCY, PUBLISHING COMPANY, EVENTS MANAGEMENT, 3PL & MANUFACTURER’S REPRESENTATIVE ALL IN ONE!:ActiveForever is a fully integrated sales, marketing, & warehousing/fulfillment services agency.•	Under Feinberg's leadership, www.ActiveForever.com was one of the top-ranked eCommerce websites in the nation.Best Choices of Wellness Products, Safety Equipment, Sport Performance & Rehabilitation/Healing, and Products for Productivity in the Home and Workplace for the Healthy and for those with Diseases and Disabilities; Helping Treatment, Environmental & Conditioning Outcomes. •	www.WesternFulfillment.com was the warehouse/fulfillment services division of the company, serving health, medical & safety product lines.•	ActiveForever Print Publishing  creates and distributes regional/targeted and national print product catalogs that patient care providers use to educate their staff & patients, to help treatment outcomes; as do safety officers & athletic trainers. •	Retail showroom with medical education center.•	A one-stop-shop for best choices of very unique medical equipment, devices & supplies for workplace ergonomics & occupational safety, fitness & healing, pain relief, aquatics, mobility & other products & devices you know you need & things you didn't know existed; even hearing loss, under water exercise equipment, medical nutrition, low vision aids, home health & patient care devices.Influencing better patient care outcomes and helping people achieve physical & environmental goals. LAUNCHING INNOVATIVE PRODUCTS         DELIVERING BETTER OUTCOMES OFFICIAL PRODUCTS PROVIDER FOR THE UNITED STATES TENNIS ASSOCIATION (USTA)!

recommendations: Erika has always been dedicated toward healthcare, wellness, and prevention with a passion for knowledge.  Fitness and exercise are worked into her private lifestyle which is a catalyst for her husband, Larryand 2 children, Marisa and Aaron. Innovation, creative marketing, and enthusiastic energy motivate her successes in all directions.  Erika is versatile and a good listener to improve her skills on a continuing basis.  I know her well.  She is my beautiful and loving daughter.  Eunicef .

October 14, 2010, Erika worked with Kim but at different companies

Opening up our interactive showrooms to someone with Kim Kubsch's energy and credentials creates such a stimulating learning experience for everyone involved.  ActiveForever.com's product management team hunts down the best choices of products to help solve practically any safety or physical goal, for home and workplace, and our selection of over 100,000 products has all been motivated by real needs.Kim Kubsch, a particularly delightful CAPS certified professional, is extremely effective at illustrating a wide variety of uses for our product lines which are designed to enable safe, independent and healthy living.Best of all, Kim shares solutions for mobility, dexterity and accessibility challenges at our joint workshops and keeps the customers and patient care professionals  happy, and coming back for more!"
